name: Ball Battle (Will_Dev)
description:
It's Pong but a lot more intense Use Powers such as Lasers, Bombs and even Psychokinesis to beat your opponent. Controls Player 1

W - Move the Bat up

S - Move to Bat down

A - Power 1

D - Power 2

E - Ability

Player 2

Up Arrow - Move the Bat up

Down Arrow - Move to Bat down

Left Arrow- Power 1

Right Arrow - Power 2

Right Ctrl - Ability

Other Info

The game currently features 11 Powers, 7 Abilities with more to come in future updates.

 A single player mode is available against bot AI with 4 difficulty levels.

How to Install

1. Download the Zip file provided 

2. Extract the Zip file (Make sure to extract to a new folder)

3. Open the file and launch Ball Battle.exe

4. A configuration prompt will show up, choose your desired resolution, windowed mode is preferred. 

5. Click Play, Have fun!
